function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Withdrawal of conservation funding due to conflict or social-political shifts","Impact":"Loss of conservation capacity and activities in lower-income countries","Mitigation":"Building resilient partnerships between conservation organizations, environmental institutions, and local communities","Technologies":"Resilience-building strategies, community engagement tools","People":"Conservation organizations, environmental institutions, local communities","Owner":"Conservation organizations, environmental institutions"},{"Description":"Dependence on tourism and visitor revenue for financing conservation activities","Impact":"Immediate impact on conservation programs and infrastructure, potential long-term funding shortfalls","Mitigation":"Reducing dependence on tourism revenue, diversifying funding sources, engaging in alternative income generation","Technologies":"Financial diversification strategies, alternative income generation tools","People":"Conservation programs, protected areas, World Heritage Sites","Owner":"Conservation programs, protected areas, World Heritage Sites"},{"Description":"Chronic underfunding of conservation programs and protected areas","Impact":"Negatively impacting the delivery of conservation outcomes","Mitigation":"Addressing funding gaps, advocating for increased investment in conservation, promoting financial sustainability","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, advocacy tools, financial sustainability models","People":"Conservation organizations, protected area managers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, protected area managers"}]}
